title: Update Employee Bank Details for Payroll
description: An employee has requested to change the bank account where their pay is deposited.

tasks.description: Receive the employee's request and new bank account details via a secure form.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the new routing and account numbers.

tasks.description: Authenticate the employee's identity to prevent fraud.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully verifies the employee's identity through a two-factor authentication process.

tasks.description: Update the employee's direct deposit information in the payroll system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the banking details.
